features: 【DOTTED TECHNOLOGY】Our design is created through a laser etching process to provide both stainless steel and non stick surface. This dual surface allows to cook with less oil, grease, and butter.Our cladding surface is 50% more than usual Hex surface pans.
【SPECIALITY】Multi-layer compositse steel effectively solves the heat conduction problem of pure steel and makes quick & even heat transfer for cooking.
【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS】Made with High-quality stainless steel, our pan is built to last. The surface is completely non-toxic for the best balance of utility and performance.
【EASY TO CLEAN】Thanks to its non-stick surface and easy-to-clean materials, our pan makes cleanup a breeze.
【UNIVERSAL】Our pan works on all types of stovetops, including gas, electric, glass, halogen, making it a versatile addition to your cookware collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose LIGTSPCE Nonstick Skillet? Our cookware uses a suspended non-stick dotted technology without a Teflon coating, which won't have coating peeling issues like aluminum cookware does after a few months. Furthermore, it does not contain PFOA, a substance harmful to health. For you and your family, it's a healthier choice.

Dotted non stick Bottom Flat and thick bottom (5mm) Stainless steel induction base Fast cooking and heat evenly Perfect for bacon,steak and omlette Anti Scald Handle Comfortable to hold and stays cooling while cooking,designed specifically to be heat-resistant. However, shorter handles that are closer to the heat will heat up more quickly. So please be careful. And always use oven mitts when removing.(Grill as well) Suitable as camping skillet and pans for cooking Rivet free design Easy to clean The best kitchen appliances and cookware for you.

USE & CARE 1.When preheating the pan, it's best not to preheat for too long, as the pan can become too hot and cause the eggs to stick. 2.Use an adequate amount of oil on the flat pan. 3.When frying eggs, it's advisable to use medium to low heat. Stainless steel has fast heat conductivity, and using medium to low heat will produce similar heat levels to what you'd get with aluminum cookware on high heat. 4.Recommend hand washing for longer term use. Suitable for dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with this purchase! It's light in weight, cleans very easily and nicely, is large enough for a good-sized omelet, doesn't have aluminum or other materials that may be toxic, doesn't ship like ceramic pans can, and at least after about 20 uses, still is cleaning up /not sticking beautifully. Based on what I've learned about ceramic cookware I expect this will last far longer (so far as food not sticking and not chipping). It's a beautiful pan and definitely the best I've had in a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't think twice- buy it
reviews.reviewText: This is my first hybrid skillet. I have non-stick, stainless steel, and cast iron. This hybrid pan is great. It is well made and has a good weight to it. You can use your metal utensils with it and don't have to worry about scratching it like you would with a non-stick pan. It is non-stick. You can scramble your eggs and they won't be stuck to the bottom of the pan. It is so easy to clean. Try it, you will be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price, Great Product
reviews.reviewText: I received my pan and used it right away, after I seasoned the pan like recommended. It is really easy to use even for someone who isn’t the best cook. I am happy with the nonstick coating. I think the heat distribution is really nice as well. Cleaning the pan was easy which is one of the biggest reasons I look for in a pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I waited a couple months to write my review because so many pans I've owned in the past, I've ended up having to throw out. They'd warp or the bottom non stick surface would wear off. Not this one! I've never owned a pan quite like this and it is just fantastic. The botton still looks brand new and nothing sticks to it. The size is perfect also as I just cook for two. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great pan for the price. Stainless bottom with a nice non-stick coating. Seems like this pan will be extremely durable. Shouldn't warp like T-fal. For the price it's a no brainer. Very solid and well made. Ordered the 12" measured more like 11". Why I docked it a star. You do have to properly oil it. Otherwise food will stick a bit. Even if it does clean up is always a breeze. I'm pretty happy with it and ordered the 10" version afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work great on an induction stovetop.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got the 10 and 12 inch pans. The REAL REASON I bought these is because not all induction pans work on my stovetop. These do! So I seasoned the pan with oil as directed and then washed it and used it the next day. Keep reading after this sentence, my over easy eggs stuck. BUT--when I went to clean the pan it was all loose. I did not have to scrub it at all. I don't know if it makes a difference but the first day I used country crock in the pan. After that I went back to my regular pan spray.The next day, my eggs over easy did not stick at all, so then I tried scrambled eggs. Easiest scrambled I have ever done. I honestly thought I was going to return the pans after my first use of the pan, but I wanna keep them now.These are heavier and thicker on the bottom. They feel like the will last, and like I said they work on my induction stovetop!! My other good set of pans are stainless steel with thick discs on the bottom and then the non stick I have are light weight coppery in color but only the small one works on the stove. I have to use the other pans on a portable induction unit.So I am really happy so far with these pans. I just can't afford those hexclad pans they are trying to sell out there.These look kind of similar so I gave it a shot. If they go bad I will change my review. I got them for me for Christmas, but they are not going under the tree. I don't even try to pull the old set. They are my go to pans now. Thank you for my new pans!! :)I attached a video of how nonstick these pans are. I made Gluten and Dairy Free Johnny Cakes. I use an ice cream scoop to measure the amount and the I have to press them down with wet fingers to a pancake shape. I use vegetable spray on the pan and my stovetop in induction. Watch how easy they move. I love this 12" pan!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality! Price can't be beat!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several different PFOA/PTFE free pans since we have birds at home and this one is the best quality amongst all! I have cooked, eggs, Indian food (dosa, very hard for pans to survive this!!), oily food, veggies and more and it's worked like a charm! It's still smooth, cleans easy and no grease left behind! Just remember to wash it off quickly after it cools !I just use a ScrubDaddy brush..it's dishwasher safe as well! Heat spreading is fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pan I've ever used.
reviews.reviewText: You won't be disappointed using this pan. This pan is so superior to ceramic pans and other non-stick coated pans. Very easy to clean and more durable and well built. The handle stays cool and is comfortable to grip. This is an excellent pan.
